description: a()=A037260 and its first [ A037261 ], 2nd [ A037262 ] and 3rd [ A037263 ] differences together include every number at most once and are monotonic and minimal.
comments: 5 is the only number less than 100 not used in any of the 4 sequences - Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Sep 25 2000
example: After 1 3 9 26 62------ 2 6 17 36------- 4 11 19-------- 7 8the next free number is 10 which we CAN add to 4th row.
crossrefs: A037260-A037263 are 4-rowed analog of A037257-A037259. See A005228, A030124 for 2-rowed version.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Sep 25 2000
